title: "I'll FEED!!" "Why?"
body:
I just had a really bad ARAM game, partially my fault by arguing with the Nidalee ally over item choice (not that I'm absolutely absolved either) when it snowballed (the argument) and she threatened to feed (which she did carry out)...

To which it made me wonder why anyone would bother to make such a threat, let alone carry it out.  It doesn't really prove either side of any sensible argument.  It sounds more like your threatening to chop off your own legs unless I admit I'm wrong...typically for something as trivial as whose taller.  Like you're just desperate for the argument to end but too prideful to concede it or to even mute the other.

Can anyone please enlighten me on what's up with that?

replies.body:
Because they are trash. Running down lane gives them power over you (or they think so) and punishes you for doing something they dont like.

Just typical entitled brat trash behavior, nothing new.
